typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Category as string,
		Regions as (Region as string, {Sub-Categories} as (EmployeeSales as (Comment as string, Employee as string, Sales as integer)[], {Sub-Category} as string)[])[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'arrayOfDocuments',
	unquotedColumnNames: true,
	hasComments: true,
	singleQuoted: true,
	backslashEscape: true) ~> source1
source1 foldDown(unroll(Regions, Regions),
	mapColumn(
		Region = Regions.Region,
		{Sub-Categories} = Regions.{Sub-Categories}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
Flatten1 derive(Region = ERROR_FUNCTION('')) ~> DerivedColumn1
